Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: talking books, language courses, newspapers and magazines, videos, DVDs, CDs and a photocopier. Runs Baby Time and Toddler Time sessions. Listening post available. Small exhibition space, meeting room available for up to 40 people with own kitchen. Provides 8 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office, internet access, printers and a scanner available for public use. 2 computers available for children. There is a public toilet in the building.
